alert.note: Alert for Cass; Lancaster; Otoe; Seward (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 9:26PM CDT until June 16 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL LANCASTER...EAST CENTRAL SEWARD...NORTHWESTERN OTOE AND SOUTHWESTERN CASS COUNTIES... At 925 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles northwest of Emerald, or 10 miles west of Lincoln, moving east at 35 mph. This storm has a history of producing 1.25 to 1.75 inch hail. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Emerald around 930 PM CDT. Lincoln Airport and Pioneers Park around 935 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Lincoln, Holmes Lake Park, Walton, Waverly and Eagle. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
